description: Apparently the old "this town ain't big enough for the two of us" cliche does not apply to Sprouts Farmers Market and Cobb County.
title: Another Sprouts Farmers Market set to open in Marietta by...
title_page: Another Sprouts Farmers Market set to open in Marietta by...
text:
Apparently the old "this town ain't big enough for the two of us" cliche does not apply to Sprouts Farmers Market and Cobb County.
The natural and organic food store announced Wednesday that it will open eight new locations in the first quarter of 2017, with one of them to be located at 3805 Dallas Highway near The Avenue West Cobb.
There is already a location in East Cobb, at 4101 Roswell Road.
Sprouts will open 36 stores total next year, bringing more than 100 career opportunities to local neighborhoods, the news release said.
The first batch of openings in 2017 will also include a location in DeKalb.
In other East Cobb food news:
» Get ready for a fiesta, East Cobb: Tin Lizzy's coming to The Avenue
» East Cobb is getting a new restaurant featuring tapas off Roswell Road
» Brixx pizza in The Avenue East Cobb closed Sunday
